payload.message: Run the session-review and workspace-improvement skills. Review sessions from the last 24 hours, identify failures and knowledge gaps, open PRs for improvements (max 2).
Run flux-ops skill to check kustomization health across all 3 clusters (ottawa, robbinsdale, stpetersburg). Report any reconciliation failures or stale revisions.

Run cluster-health skill across all 3 clusters. Check for pods in non-Running state, nodes with pressure conditions, Ceph health warnings, PVCs near capacity, and certificates expiring within 14 days. Summarize findings and alert on anything critical.

Check VolSync ReplicationSource status across all clusters. Verify last successful backup timestamps are within expected windows. Report any ReplicationSources with failed or stale conditions. Run: kubectl get replicationsource -A -o wide for each cluster context.
